name: Google Voice - Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for Google Voice
additional_info:
v2.2 fixed various text being too dark to see, context menus etc
v2.1 fixed time stamps on SMS not visible
v2.0 fixed "People" list for group text names were too dark
V1.0 initial release

discussions.name: This style does not style the "Call" section on the right side of Google Voice
